titles: Abraham's prospect Being a sermon preached at the funeral of Mr John Williams, late vicar of Devinnocke, in the parish-church of Llanspithid in the county of Brecon, on the 12th day of June, 1680. By Owen Griffith.
author: Griffith, Owen.
publisher: printed for H. Brome, at the Gun in St. Paul's Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Dr. Williams' Library, London.
keywords: Williams, John, d. 1680 --  Early works to 1800.
